step.datasource:
TRUNCATE TABLE [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd
INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd (ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid) SELECT ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE magcode = '1'

INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_SOx_Log (ComponentName, PropName, DataKey, OldValue, NewValue, Creator, runid) SELECT 'voorrd' AS ComponentName , 'CycleCount' AS PropName , v.ID AS DataKey , a.CountingCycle AS OldValue , ISNULL(v.CountingCycle, 0) AS NewValue , '999' AS Creator , '%runid%' AS runid FROM dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Items AS i WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.artcode=i.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode = '1' AND i.Class_10 = '10.00' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle --OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL OR v.CountingCycle IS NULL )

INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd_Log (ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid, runid) SELECT v.ID, v.magcode, v.artcode, v.maglok, v.minvrd, v.maxvrd, v.veilvrd, v.bestniv, v.blokkeer, v.DeliveryTimeInDays, v.res_id, v.CostPrice, v.CountingCycle, v.OrderPolicyCode, v.PeriodOrderDays, v.DateLastCounted, v.Division, v.syscreated, v.syscreator, v.sysmodified, v.sysmodifier, v.sysguid, '%runid%' AS runid FROM dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Items AS i WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.artcode=i.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode = '1' AND Class_10 = '10.00' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle --OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL OR v.CountingCycle IS NULL )

-- Update artikel our shadow table UPDATE [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd SET CountingCycle=v.CountingCycle --SELECT v.ID, a.artcode, v.countingcycle, a.artcode, a.countingcycle FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode='1' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL AND v.CountingCycle IS NULL )
-- Insert new artikel our shadow table INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd (ID, artcode, CountingCycle, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid) SELECT v.ID, v.artcode, v.CountingCycle, v.syscreated, v.syscreator, v.sysmodified, v.sysmodifier, v.sysguid FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode='1' AND a.ID IS NULL
-- Delete removed artikel from our shadow table DELETE dbo._AB_tb_voorrd --SELECT * FROM dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.ID IS NULL

TRUNCATE TABLE [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd
INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd (ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid) SELECT ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE magcode = '1'

INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_SOx_Log (ComponentName, PropName, DataKey, OldValue, NewValue, Creator, runid) SELECT 'voorrd' AS ComponentName , 'CycleCount' AS PropName , v.ID AS DataKey , a.CountingCycle AS OldValue , ISNULL(v.CountingCycle, 0) AS NewValue , '999' AS Creator , '%runid%' AS runid FROM dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Items AS i WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.artcode=i.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode = '1' AND i.Class_10 = '10.00' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle --OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL OR v.CountingCycle IS NULL )

INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd_Log (ID, magcode, artcode, maglok, minvrd, maxvrd, veilvrd, bestniv, blokkeer, DeliveryTimeInDays, res_id, CostPrice, CountingCycle, OrderPolicyCode, PeriodOrderDays, DateLastCounted, Division, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid, runid) SELECT v.ID, v.magcode, v.artcode, v.maglok, v.minvrd, v.maxvrd, v.veilvrd, v.bestniv, v.blokkeer, v.DeliveryTimeInDays, v.res_id, v.CostPrice, v.CountingCycle, v.OrderPolicyCode, v.PeriodOrderDays, v.DateLastCounted, v.Division, v.syscreated, v.syscreator, v.sysmodified, v.sysmodifier, v.sysguid, '%runid%' AS runid FROM dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Items AS i WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.artcode=i.ItemCode WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode = '1' AND Class_10 = '10.00' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle --OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL OR v.CountingCycle IS NULL )

-- Update artikel our shadow table UPDATE [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd SET CountingCycle=v.CountingCycle --SELECT v.ID, a.artcode, v.countingcycle, a.artcode, a.countingcycle FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode='1' AND (v.CountingCycle <> a.CountingCycle OR a.CountingCycle IS NULL AND v.CountingCycle IS NULL )
-- Insert new artikel our shadow table INSERT INTO [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd (ID, artcode, CountingCycle, syscreated, syscreator, sysmodified, sysmodifier, sysguid) SELECT v.ID, v.artcode, v.CountingCycle, v.syscreated, v.syscreator, v.sysmodified, v.sysmodifier, v.sysguid FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.magcode='1' AND a.ID IS NULL
-- Delete removed artikel from our shadow table DELETE dbo._AB_tb_voorrd --SELECT * FROM dbo._AB_tb_voorrd AS a WITH (NOLOCK) FULL OUTER JOIN dbo.voorrd AS v WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.ID=a.ID WHERE 1=1 AND v.ID IS NULL
